With this release now you can log in using your phone number as well.
In this release we have fixed a lot of issues including audio selection for casting, made the loading of trays on pages faster, and made our in app payments more resilient.
In this release we have fixed a lot of issues including audio selection for casting.
We are testing out a new version of our show and movie detail page.

Hotstar is now becoming more social. You can invite your friends to the Hotstar app using your phonebook. You can see which of your friends you are competing with while playing Watch 'N Play on our brand new social leaderboard.
